title: After Buterin, Ethereum Foundation Transfers 1.7K ETH To Uniswap
author: Ross
excerpt: Crypto analytics platform Arkham Intelligence‚Äôs data revealed that the wallet address ‚Äú0x9eE457023bB3De16D51A003a247BaEaD7fce313D,‚Äù belonging to the Ethereum Foundation, swapped 1,700 ETH for 2.738 million USDC on the Uniswap decentralized exchange. However, earlier today, an MEV Bot attacked the Foundation during the transaction, resulting in a significant loss.

title: APE Investors Disheartened as Its Price Dips 97% From ATH
author: Danielle du Toit
excerpt: Many investors feel dejected when looking at the current Apecoin (APE) price. One investor took to X yesterday sharing his own disappointment with the meme coin‚Äôs performance as he bought the token when it was worth $23.63. His holdings that totaled $35,445 are now worth only about $1,635.

title: Whales Accumulate 26.7% of XRP With Transactions on the Ledger Dwindling, How?
author: Chryzano Ariston
excerpt: Market intelligent platform for on-chain and social metrics, Santiment tweeted that the XRP ledger has seen less activity compared to 2021 and 2022. However, this has not stopped the Whales and the Sharks from accumulating XRP. Wallets with 100K-100M $XRP hold $7.89B in coins at present while a year ago it was $7.16B.¬† As such, wallets holding 100K -100M XRP have 26.7% of the supply of XRP.

title: Understanding the $65B Line of Credit: Key Testimony in SBF Trial
author: Rawan Alamin
excerpt: In the ongoing trial of Sam Bankman-Fried, former CEO of FTX, Gary Wang, former CTO, revealed that Alameda Research has a $65 billion line of credit on FTX. Crypto journalist Laura Shin hosted Sam Enzer, partner at Cahill Gordon and Reindel, and Brian Klein, partner at Waymaker, to discuss Wang‚Äôs testimony and how it could damage the defense.

title: Are Ethereum Insiders Selling Integrity for Monetary Gains?
author: Vignesh Karunanidhi
excerpt: A recent tweet by on-chain sleuth TruthLabs argues Ethereum has evolved into a centralized cartel that has enriched insiders while holding back innovation across crypto.

title: ETH‚Äôs Price Could Suffer If History Repeats Itself: Analyst
author: Danielle du Toit
excerpt: Cryptocurrency analyst, Benjamin Cowen, shared in one of his latest YouTube videos that he has not been impressed by Ethereum‚Äôs (ETH) performance this year. In his analysis, Cowen placed particular emphasis on the ETH / Bitcoin (BTC) valuation, as well as the effects that the Merge could have on ETH‚Äôs future performance.

title: BNB Burn Coming Soon: Another Step Towards a Decentralized Future
author: Abdulrasaq Ariwoola
excerpt: Changpeng Zhao, co-founder and chief executive officer of crypto exchange Binance, in a recent tweet on X ‚Äì formerly X ‚Äì told the Binance community members to anticipate a BNB burn in a few days. The upcoming burn will be the fourth this year, after a previous burn in July.

title: Here Are CoinmarketCap‚Äôs Top 5 Gainers in the Past 24 Hours
author: Ikemefula Aruogu
excerpt: Bitcoin dragged the rest of the crypto market when it climbed above $27,000 at the beginning of Q4 2023. That move breathed new life into the crypto market, injecting some missing volatility. Various altcoins have moved at varying paces over the past few days, and in the past 24 hours, XTZ, ATOM, STX, KLAY, and OKB have topped the gainers‚Äô table on CoinMarketCap.

title: ALGO Could Rally Significantly During the Bull Market: Influencer
author: Ikemefula Aruogu
excerpt: According to the cryptocurrency influencer Classy Crypto, Algorand has significant upside potential and could rally well when the bull market returns. In a recently uploaded video, the renowned influencer described the Algorand blockchain project and reviewed its performance over the years as a blockchain solution and a cryptocurrency.

title: Crypto Prices Today: BTC, SOL, DOGE Take Their Toll on the Market
author: Steven Walgenbach
excerpt: CoinMarketCap indicated that the cryptocurrency market was hit with a wave of sell volume over the past 24 hours. Subsequently, the market‚Äôs collective valuation was down 1.91% and estimated to be around $1.07 trillion at press time. The losses of Bitcoin (BTC), Solana (SOL), and Dogecoin (DOGE) had the biggest impact on the market during the past day of trading.

title: This Hidden Ethereum (ETH) Support Is Extremely Important
author: Arman Shirinyan
excerpt: Ethereum, the second-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization, has been experiencing a challenging phase. The once-thriving DeFi and NFT sectors, which significantly contributed to Ethereum's meteoric rise, are currently subdued. The buzz and activity around these sectors have dwindled, leading to a noticeable decline in Ethereum's trading volume.

title: XRP Price Crash Reveals Intriguing Fact: Details
author: Tomiwabold Olajide
excerpt: XRP plummeted along with the rest of the crypto market on Oct. 9 as bearish pressure emerged. XRP, the fifth cryptocurrency by market capitalization, fell to intraday lows of $0.487 from highs of $0.52, reaching a three-week low, or lows last seen on Sept. 18.

title: Cardano (ADA) Project Catalyst Achieved Number of Milestones in Fund10 Round
author: Vladislav Sopov
excerpt: Cardano (ADA), the second-largest proof-of-stake (PoS) blockchain by market captalization, has just finished its decentralized funding initiative, Project Catalyst. Its tenth iteration set an impressive number of record-breaking highs in key metrics.

title: Shiba Inu (SHIB) Triggers 1,500% On-chain Spike, What's Going On?
author: Tomiwabold Olajide
excerpt: Canine-themed Shiba Inu is showing a surprising on-chain spike as the market experiences selling pressure.

title: Base TVL Jumps 26% in Week, What's Behind This Move?
author: Godfrey Benjamin
excerpt: Layer-2 blockchain protocol Base has hit a new milestone as it pushes on to enforce its dominance among the L2 chains on the Ethereum blockchain.¬†According to data from L2Beat, the Base network's total value locked (TVL) is now pegged at $550 million, up by more than 26% in the week-to-date (WTD) period.

title: Binance (BNB) Launches Copy Trading Module
author: Vladislav Sopov
excerpt: Binance (BNB), the world's largest cryptocurrency trading platform, invites all of their customers to try their skills in an automated copy trading module. Its leaderboard features master traders with impressive PnL and assets under management (AUM) metrics.

title: Ethereum's Vitalik Buterin Attracts More Criticism from Cardano's Hoskinson
author: Alex Dovbnya
excerpt: Ethereum's co-founder Vitalik Buterin recently discussed potential protocol and staking pool changes for the Ethereum network, suggesting they could enhance decentralization and efficiency. However, his comments have drawn criticism from Charles Hoskinson, the founder of Cardano, and other members of the Cardano community.

title: Tornado Cash Reigns Supreme on Ethereum
author: Alex Dovbnya
excerpt: Despite facing sanctions from the U.S. Treasury in August 2022, Tornado Cash continues to dominate as the premier crypto mixer on the Ethereum network.¬†

title: Top Ripple Executive Calls It Quits

title: Multiple Bitcoin Price ATHs? Binance CEO Weighs In on Bitcoin Halving

excerpt: Binance, one of the world's largest cryptocurrency exchanges, has added a bitcoin halving countdown to its homepage. In his post, CEO Changpeng Zhao has hinted that the price of Bitcoin could see multiple all-time highs if the flagship cryptocurrency were to repeat previous price cycles.¬†

title: Shiba Inu Eyes Explosive 353% Surge in Large Transactions Worth 2.6 Trillion SHIB
author: Gamza Khanzadaev

This meteoric rise unfolded within the span of a day since the weekend started.

title: Bancor (BNT) up 48%, Here's Possible Reason

title: XRP Ledger Unveils Crucial Feature: Details

This new innovation is being pushed to make XRPL more usable for both the developers building on it as well as users looking to make an inspection.
